item.title: My First Post
item.description: this is my first blog on top of hugo and it easy to setup. I write my blogs on hashnode as of now. You can check it here

item.title: blogging is fun
item.description: Hey there My name is Anurag and I’m a student now. I love to write technical articles. Here is the compilation of all the blogs that I have written in the past. A huge shout out to kubesimplify for the providing platform. Navigating through CNCF landscape Managing Contexts in kubernetes With plugins Secure Your Kubernetes Cluster With Kubescape Getting started with Kyverno Kyverno and Cosign Arkade Kyverno CLI Creating multinode cluster locally Avoid overspending with kubecost I will update this list quaterly.
